help-file.title: PALADIN
help-file.content:
Paladins are holy warriors that are dedicated to their gods and to bringing good to the world. They are hearty fighters that possess limited clerical powers granted to them as a reward for their virtue and chivalry. Paladins are slightly less skilled than pure Warriors and are the best horsemen in the world. They have an innate bonus to all saving throws and always detect evil and good.
Paladins may *not* set "toggle vicious" to on, nor may they set AGGR on, as this goes against all their training and principles.
Note: Paladins gain less experience from attacking the wrong things!
As follows: and Victim is EVIL: gain full XP as normal. If Victim is aggressive to either GOOD alignment or Humans: and Victim is GOOD or NEUTRAL: gain less XP from normal. If Victim is not aggressive to either GOOD alignment or Humans: and Victim is GOOD or NEUTRAL: gain much less XP from normal.
Allowable races: Human, Half-Elf Innate abilities: Lay Hands, Detect Evil, Detect Good, Summon Mount Equipment usage: Paladins have their own classification of item restriction. They can use almost all weapons and most type of armor, but are somewhat limited in their use of miscellaneous magical items.
